thread.title: A note to Dakota, about Valentine’s Day
thread.title_full: A note to Dakota, about Valentine’s Day

author: Bristol Palin
title: A note to Dakota, about Valentine’s Day
text:
Feb 14, 2017 at 9:44am PST 
Two years ago yesterday, this handsome man took me on our 1st date!! 
It’s been rainbows and butterfly kisses ever since. 
(Just playinn!!) 
We’ve seen some of the highest highs – and lowest lows, but I am so thankful for where God has brought us. 
You are the greatest husband, father, and best friend that I could’ve ever dreamt of. Thank you for all you do and sacrifice for our family, you are my world!! Buy our books!
